roleset.name: (cause to) be on a team
roleset.note: TEAM-V NOTES: Member of Vncls amalgamate-22.2-2. (from team.01-v)

role.descr: theme, thing being included in some group

example.name: typically with agent
example.text: John teamed his ideas with the professor's argument.

roleset.name: (cause to) be on a team
roleset.note: TEAM_UP-V NOTES: Member of Vncls conspire-71, also see amalgamate-22.2-2. (from team.02-v)

role.descr: first (or all if in one mention) thing being included in some group

example.name: typically without agent
example.text: But whether the pilots can team up with their longtime adversaries, the machinists, is another question.
example.arg: with their longtime adversaries, the machinists,

example.name: all args
example.text: Gordy then teamed up the Temptations with Smokey Robinson, a liaison that was to prove highly fruitful.
example.arg: a liaison that was to prove highly fruitful
